# Shabito

> Apps, bios and tools for Chaturbate

## Context

I design clean, mobile-first Chaturbate bios and build lightweight apps that help models stand out and grow.

**Target audience:** Chaturbate content creators, cam models, and adult performers seeking professional bio designs and automation tools to enhance their streaming presence and audience engagement.

**Geographic focus:** Global (English-speaking), with services delivered remotely worldwide.

**Experience:** Custom bio design and app development specifically for the Chaturbate platform since 2025.

## Services

### Custom Chaturbate Bio Design

Professional Chaturbate bio designer creating custom Chaturbate bios (CB biographies) with strong visual identity and clear structure. Whether you need a Chaturbate bio, CB bio, or Chaturbate biography, I create mobile-friendly designs that help cam models stand out.

**Complete Bio Design Package includes:**
- Unique, personalized visual design matching your brand
- Clean, mobile-friendly, responsive CB bio layout
- Structured sections (About Me, tips menu, socials, links)
- Pinned links to socials and external sites
- HTML/CSS optimized specifically for Chaturbate

**Pricing:**
- 25 USD / 500 Chaturbate tokens (per bio)
- One-time fee, no hidden costs
- Turnaround time: 1-3 days

**Target Keywords:** chaturbate bio design, custom chaturbate bio, chaturbate bio designer, CB bio, chaturbate biography

## Work

### Chaturbate Bios

Selected custom bios I designed and implemented:

- **Violeta Rain**, [violetarainn](https://chaturbate.com/violetarainn)
- **Ema Delacroix**, [emadelacroix](https://chaturbate.com/emadelacroix)
- **Lilith Nocturne**, [lilith_nocturne](https://chaturbate.com/lilith_nocturne)
- **Tatiana**, [sumersunsett](https://chaturbate.com/sumersunsett)
- **Evelyn Desire**, [evelyn_desire](https://chaturbate.com/evelyn_desire)

### Chaturbate Apps

Apps published on Chaturbate:

- [BetterNotices](https://chaturbate.com/v2apps/apps/41983e1a-betternotices): Smart chat notices with automation, dynamic placeholders, and link management.
- [ShowMoji](https://chaturbate.com/v2apps/apps/57d31a05-showmoji): Rotating hashtags and room-status indicator badges.
- [FollowMeter](https://chaturbate.com/v2apps/apps/4fc060e7-followmeter): Live follower tracker displaying real-time follower growth during a stream.

### Tools and Apps

Other tools and apps I created:

- [CamKeeper](https://github.com/byshabito/camkeeper): A cross-site creator profile manager browser extension for Chrome and Firefox.

## Technical Stack

- **Platform:** Jekyll (static site generator)
- **Hosting:** GitHub Pages
- **Styling:** Custom CSS with CSS custom properties, responsive design, dark mode support
- **Fonts:** Inter, JetBrains Mono (Google Fonts)
- **Languages:** HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (vanilla)
- **Markdown:** Kramdown
- **Image formats:** WebP with PNG fallbacks
- **Icons:** SVG (inline and external)

## FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

**How much does a Chaturbate bio designer cost?**
$25 USD (or 500 Chaturbate tokens). One-time fee for a complete, custom-designed, mobile-friendly CB bio.

**What makes a good Chaturbate bio?**
Mobile-friendly design, consistent branding, clear structure. Essential elements: About Me section, tips menu, room rules, social media links, and calls-to-action that convert viewers to fans.

**How long does it take to get my custom bio?**
Typical turnaround is 1-3 days after discussing requirements.

**Do you offer Chaturbate app development too?**
Yes! Published Chaturbate app developer. Can help with custom bots, overlay apps, and interactive features.

**Do you work with new cam models?**
Absolutely! Work with both new and experienced cam models.
